sqlMap.select: SELECT personCode, personName, personPhone, personEmail, personSex, personPhoto FROM person WHERE isEnabled!=0 and ( locate(#personName#,personName)>0 or locate(#personCode#,personCode)>0 or locate(#personPhone#,personPhone)>0 or locate(#personEmail#,personEmail)>0 or locate(#personSex#,personSex)>0 ) limit #startValue#,#endValue#

SELECT count(*) as countValue FROM person WHERE isEnabled!=0 and ( locate(#personName#,personName)>0 or locate(#personCode#,personCode)>0 or locate(#personPhone#,personPhone)>0 or locate(#personEmail#,personEmail)>0 or locate(#personSex#,personSex)>0)
SELECT personCode, personName, personPhone, personEmail, personSex, personPhoto FROM person WHERE personCode = #personCode# and isEnabled=1
sqlMap.update: UPDATE person SET personName=#personName#, personPhone=#personPhone#, personEmail=#personEmail#, personSex=#personSex#, personPhoto=#personPhoto#, isEnabled=1 WHERE personCode= #personCode#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE person SET isEnabled=0 WHERE personCode= #personCode#
